name: Tauers - my new game
description:
Tauers is a game created in Unity and designed for Android phones and tablets.

Rules are simple - you are the tower and you need to destroy other towers.

Simple game for everybody! Any feedback will be appreciated!

Watch Tauers Gameplay Trailer, where the most important components of the project were presented: YouTube!

You can download this game from Google Play!

I hope you will enjoy it!
